description: When Hideyoshi`s tone-deaf twin is asked to sing the school song, he`s roped into a costume change that`s just asking for trouble. Then, Akihisa gets a new admirer-or two?-when he risks his neck to help Hazuki cheer up her big sis.

titles.title: Boku to Ano Musume to Nuigurumi!
Me, That Girl, and a Stuffed Toy!
僕とあの娘とぬいぐるみっ!
